title: How (Not) to Play With Magic
description: A Cindy Eller Short story.Cindy Eller is a witch and a baker. She is making a name for herself in the world of desserts with her new and unique flavor profiles.But juggling her weird family and trying to keep her magic a secret from her roommates is a daily challenge.And her twin sisters, Starrie and Rainey Skye won't hesitate to bring the trouble right to her door.
author: Elizabeth A. Reeves
